description: Single storey, part two storey rear and side (wraparound) extension incorporating terrace to the first floor rear elevation (following demolition of existing side extension and conservatory); alterations to existing basement involving excavation to provide basement access; and raised rear terrace
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: Design and Access Statement; Heritage Statement; Flood Risk Assessment; Tree Survey, Arboricultural Impact Assessment, Arboricultural Method Statement & Tree Protection Plan  20, 168, 0S (Existing Location Plan and Block Plan); 20, 168, 100 (Existing Site Plan); 21, 168, 201 (Existing Basement Floor Plan); 21,168, 202 (Existing Ground Floor Plan); 21, 168, 203 (Existing Floor Plan); 21, 168, 204 (Existing Second Floor Plan); 21, 168, 205 (Existing Roof Plan); 21, 168, 206 (Existing Section A-A); 21, 168, 207 (Existing Section B-B); 21, 168, 208 (Existing Front Elevation); 21, 168, 209 (Existing Rear Elevation); 21, 168, 210 (Existing East Elevation); 21, 168, 211 (Existing West Elevation); 20, 168, POS (Proposed Block Plan); 20, 168, 220 (Proposed Site Plan); 21, 168, 221 (Proposed Basement Floor Plan); 21, 68, 222 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); 21, 168, 223 (Proposed First Floor Plan); 21, 168, 224 (Proposed Second Floor Plan); 21, 168, 225 (Proposed Roof Plan); 21, 168, 231 (Proposed Basement Floor Plan); 21, 168, 232 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); 21, 168, 233 (Proposed First Floor Plan); 21, 168, 234 (Proposed Second Floor Plan); 21, 168, 236 (Proposed Section A-A); 21, 168, 237 (Proposed Section B-B); 21, 168, 238 (Proposed Front Elevation); 21, 168, 239 (Proposed Rear Elevation); 21, 168, 240 (Proposed East Elevation); 21, 168, 241 (Proposed West Elevation); 21, 168, 242 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); 21, 168, 243 (Proposed Front Treatment).
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless otherwise stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), Policies 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).

| All tree protection measures related to the construction of the extension hereby approved shall be implemented during construction as per the submitted Tree Survey, Arboricultural Impact Assessment, Arboricultural Method Statement & Tree Protection Plan.

Reason: To protect trees nearest the extension that contribute positively to the amenity of the property and the character of the Ealing Common Conservation Area, in accordance with conservation area management plan and appraisal.
| No part of the flat roofs of the proposed dwellinghouse shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
